comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: See www.flickr.com/photos/nationallibrarynz_commons/3057284254/ The statue is one of the lion bronzes surrounding the Queen Victoria Memorial. According to a comment on panoramicearth.blogspot.com/2006/11/victoria-memorial-by-... it symbolizes Industry and was a gift from New Zealand.
